Enums/ManeuverType.html#/c:@E@MBVManeuve.name: onRamp
Enums/ManeuverType.html#/c:@E@MBVManeuve.abstract: Take a ramp to enter a highway

Enums/ManeuverType.html#/c:@E@MBVManeuve.abstract: Take a ramp to exit a highway

Classes/VisionARManager.html#/s:14Mapbox.name: delegate
Classes/VisionARManager.html#/s:14Mapbox.abstract: Delegate for VisionARManager. Delegate is held as a weak reference.

Classes/VisionARManager.html#/s:14Mapbox.name: set(fenceVisibilityDistance:)
Classes/VisionARManager.html#/s:14Mapbox.abstract: Set AR fence visibility distance in meters.

Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.name: isLogoVisible
Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.abstract: Control the visibility of the Mapbox logo.

Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.name: isLaneVisible
Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.abstract: Control the visibility of the lane. Defatul is YES

Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.name: isFenceVisible
Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.abstract: Control the visibility of the fences. Default is NO

Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.name: set(arManager:)
Classes/VisionARViewController.html#/c:o.abstract: Set VisionARManager to enable rendering of ar lane on the view. VisionARManager is held as a weak reference.

Classes/RoutePoint.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVRo.abstract: Geographical coordinate of the point along the route

Classes/RoutePoint.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVRo.abstract: Maneuver type of the point to perform

Classes/Route.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVRoute(p.name: eta
Classes/Route.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVRoute(p.abstract: Estimated time of arrival expressed in seconds

Classes/LaneVisualParams.html#/c:objc(cs.name: arrowLength
Classes/LaneVisualParams.html#/c:objc(cs.abstract: Length of each single arrow of the lane

Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.name: verticalOffset
Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Vertical offset from the surface of the road in meters

Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.name: horizontalOffset
Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Horizontal offset from the center of the road in meters

Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.name: sectionsCount
Classes/FenceVisualParams.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Number of sections that the fence consists of

Classes/ARLane.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARLane.name: curve
Classes/ARLane.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARLane.abstract: Cubic spline describing geometry of the AR lane

Classes/ARFence.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARFen.name: curve
Classes/ARFence.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARFen.abstract: Cubic spline describing geometry of the AR fence

Classes/ARFence.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARFen.name: offset
Classes/ARFence.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARFen.abstract: The direction of horizontal offset from the spline. 1.0 stands for the offset to the right side of the road, -1.0 stands for the offset to the left side of the road.

Classes/ARCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARCa.name: fov
Classes/ARCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARCa.abstract: Vertical field of view expressed in radians

Classes/ARCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MBVARCa.abstract: Height above the road surface in meters

Classes/ARFence.html.name: ARFence
Classes/ARFence.html.abstract: State of an AR fence in the world space.

Classes/ARLane.html.name: ARLane
Classes/ARLane.html.abstract: State of an AR lane in the world space.

Classes/FenceVisualParams.html.name: FenceVisualParams
Classes/FenceVisualParams.html.abstract: Parameters used by MBVVisionARViewController to draw AR fence.

Classes/LaneVisualParams.html.name: LaneVisualParams
Classes/LaneVisualParams.html.abstract: Parameters used by MBVVisionARViewController to draw AR lane.

Classes/Route.html.name: Route
Classes/Route.html.abstract: Route provided by a route engine and used to draw an AR lane.

Classes/VisionARViewController.html.name: VisionARViewController
Classes/VisionARViewController.html.abstract: Class that represents visual component that renders video stream from the camera and AR navigation route on top of that.

Classes/VisionARManager.html.name: VisionARManager
Classes/VisionARManager.html.abstract: VisionARManager is an entry point to the high-level framework MapboxVisionAR focused on AR related tasks.
